name: Either

values.name: andMap
values.comment:
Apply the function that is inside `Either` to a value that is inside
`Either`. Return the result inside `Either`. If one of the `Either`
arguments is `Left x`, return `Left x`. Also known as `apply`.
values.type: Either.Either x (a -> b) -> Either.Either x a -> Either.Either x b

values.name: andThen
values.comment:
Chain together in many computations that will stop computing if
a chain is on a `Left`. Also known as `bind`.
values.type: Either.Either x a -> (a -> Either.Either x b) -> Either.Either x b

values.name: either
values.comment: Alias for `elim`.
values.type: (a -> c) -> (b -> c) -> Either.Either a b -> c

values.name: elim
values.comment:
Given a function for both `Left` and `Right` to to type a generic
type `c`, collapse down the `Either` to a value of that type.
values.type: (a -> c) -> (b -> c) -> Either.Either a b -> c

values.name: fromLeft
values.comment: Extract left value or a default.
values.type: a -> Either.Either a b -> a

values.name: fromMaybe
values.comment:
Convert from a `Maybe` to `Either` with a default value
for `Left` for `Nothing`.
values.type: a -> Maybe.Maybe b -> Either.Either a b

values.name: fromResult
values.comment: Convert from `Result` to `Either`.
values.type: Result.Result a b -> Either.Either a b

values.name: fromRight
values.comment: Extract right value or a default.
values.type: b -> Either.Either a b -> b

values.name: isLeft
values.comment: Returns `True` if argument is `Left _`
values.type: Either.Either a b -> Bool

values.name: isRight
values.comment: Returns `True` if argument is `Right _`
values.type: Either.Either a b -> Bool

values.name: leftFromMaybe
values.comment:
Convert from a `Maybe` to `Either` with a default value
for `Right` for `Nothing`.
values.type: b -> Maybe.Maybe a -> Either.Either a b

values.name: leftToMaybe
values.comment: `Maybe` get the `Left` side of an `Either`.
values.type: Either.Either a x -> Maybe.Maybe a

values.name: lefts
values.comment: Converts a `List` of `Either a x` to a List of `a`.
values.type: List (Either.Either a x) -> List a

values.name: map
values.comment:
Apply a function to an `Either`. If the argument is `Right`, it
will be converted.  If the argument is an `Left`, the same left value
will propogate through.
values.type: (a -> b) -> Either.Either x a -> Either.Either x b

values.name: map2
values.comment:
Apply a function to two eithers, if both arguments are `Right`.
If not, the first argument which is a `Left` will propagate through.
Also known as `liftA2`.
values.type: (a -> b -> c) -> Either.Either x a -> Either.Either x b -> Either.Either x c

values.name: map3
values.comment: Like `map2`, but with 3 eithers. Also known as `liftA3`
values.type: (a -> b -> c -> d) -> Either.Either x a -> Either.Either x b -> Either.Either x c -> Either.Either x d

values.name: mapBoth
values.comment:
Apply the first argument function to a `Left` and the second
argument function to a `Right` of an `Either`.
values.type: (a -> b) -> (c -> d) -> Either.Either a c -> Either.Either b d

values.name: mapDefault
values.comment:
Apply a function to `Right` value. If argument was a `Left` use the
default value. Equivalent to `Either.map >> Either.fromRight`.
values.type: c -> (b -> c) -> Either.Either x b -> c

values.name: mapLeft
values.comment: Apply a function to the `Left` of an `Either`.
values.type: (a -> b) -> Either.Either a x -> Either.Either b x

values.name: mapRight
values.comment: Alias for `map`.
values.type: (a -> b) -> Either.Either x a -> Either.Either x b

values.name: partition
values.comment:
Converts a `List` of `Either a b`, into a tuple2 where
the first value is a `List a` and the second is `List b`.
values.type: List (Either.Either a b) -> ( List a, List b )

values.name: rightFromMaybe
values.comment: Alias for `fromMaybe`.
values.type: a -> Maybe.Maybe b -> Either.Either a b

values.name: rightToMaybe
values.comment: Alias for `toMaybe`.
values.type: Either.Either x b -> Maybe.Maybe b

values.name: rights
values.comment: Converts a `List` of `Either x b` to a List of `b`.
values.type: List (Either.Either x b) -> List b

values.name: singleton
values.comment:
Create a `singleton` from a value to an `Either` with a `Right`
of the same type.  Also known as `pure`.
values.type: b -> Either.Either x b

values.name: swap
values.comment: Swap the `Left` and `Right` sides of an `Either`.
values.type: Either.Either a b -> Either.Either b a

values.name: toMaybe
values.comment: `Maybe` get the `Right` side of an `Either`.
values.type: Either.Either x b -> Maybe.Maybe b

values.name: toResult
values.comment: Convert from `Either` to `Result`.
values.type: Either.Either a b -> Result.Result a b

values.name: withDefault
values.comment: Alias for `fromRight`
values.type: b -> Either.Either a b -> b
